thread.title: 150 Acres Farm 90 Acres Natural Stone Quarry
thread.title_full: 150 Acres Farm 90 Acres Natural Stone Quarry

title: 150 Acres Farm 90 Acres Natural Stone Quarry
text: Questions Business Summary 150 acres farm with 90 acres of natural stone deposits to be licensed as quarry located near Orillia, 1 hr north of Toronto. Current studies to date have proven approx 1.044 million tonnes of dimensional stone would be able to be extracted with the proposed license. 20,000 tonnes per year (500 tractor trailer loads or 30,000-40,000 pieces of dimensional stones) would yield a 50-75 year life expectancy of the quarry. At an average profit of $15-$25/tonne that works out to $300,000 - $500,000 per year. On year around paved road up to MTO specifications designated in quarry area by the Ramara township as a haul road. All types of dimensional stone armour stone, flagstone, waterfall rock, weathered armour stone and all other types of landscape stone readily available. Substantial inventory of excavated limestone on the ground ready to go. Applications for rezoning and quarry license are ready to be filed. All studies to date include: environmental, archaeological, geological, hydro-geological, traffic and noise studies. Owner is willing to continue working on finalizing the license after the sale as well, (dealing with consultant, attending town meetings attending site visits if need be etc.)Owner does not anticipate any of this being necessary as all of the field work is complete. Solar Farm Potential. Property taxes $3,600. Asking price $1,299,800 Andrew Sobczak On Georgian Bay Real Estate Inc. Real Estate Brokerage RR2, Box 174, Victoria Harbour, ON, L0K 2A0 phone 705 543 1341
